name: Australian International Digital Currency Exchange Token
description: ADCX（Australian international Digital Currency Exchange）is a cross-chain asset exchange protocol based on the Ethereum Network. It is mainly used in NFT asset mortgage lending and NFT liquidity mining. A DeFi financial system incorporating DeFi+DAO+NFT+Cross-chain technology has been designed to provide services such as issuing, trading various assets and liquidity mining (e.g., DeFi, NFT, token trading strategies) through the ADCX protocol.
